class.rdfs:comment: An order item is a line of an order. It includes the quantity and shipping details of a bought offer.
class.rdfs:label: OrderItem

schema:orderDelivery.rdfs:comment: The delivery of the parcel related to this order or order item.
schema:orderDelivery.rdfs:label: orderDelivery

schema:orderItemNumber.rdfs:comment: The identifier of the order item.
schema:orderItemNumber.rdfs:label: orderItemNumber

schema:orderItemStatus.rdfs:comment: The current status of the order item.
schema:orderItemStatus.rdfs:label: orderItemStatus

schema:orderQuantity.rdfs:comment: The number of the item ordered. If the property is not set, assume the quantity is one.
schema:orderQuantity.rdfs:label: orderQuantity
